pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.4: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:0.5: 96. The training rule on not wearing a bust cover
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.2: a nun had entered a village for almsfood without wearing her bust cover.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.3: While she was walking along a street a whirlwind lifted up her upper robes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.6: Because she was made fun of by those people, she was humiliated.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.7: After returning to the nuns’ dwelling place she told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.8: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.9: “How can a nun enter an inhabited area without wearing her bust cover?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.10: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.13: “… How can a nun enter an inhabited area without wearing her bust cover?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.14: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.15: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.16: ‘If a nun enters an inhabited area without wearing her bust cover, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.8: for the purpose of concealing the body below the collar bone and above the navel.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.10: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed village, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.1.11: If she goes beyond the vicinity of an unenclosed village, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.9: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.10: The thirteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.11: The ninth chapter on sunshades and sandals is finished.
